article.title: Communication in the Physical and Social Sciences
article.author: Garvey, W.D.Lin, N.Nelson, C.E.
article.text: This article focuses on differences between the physical and the social sciences regarding three major factors associated with the dissemination and assimilation of scientific information: (i) lags in the process of information flow; (ii) the organization and effectiveness of informal networks; and (iii) the transfer of information from the informal to the formal domain.
